aors.module.visopengl3d.space.component
Class Track

java.lang.Object
  aors.module.visopengl3d.space.component.Track
All Implemented Interfaces:
SpaceComponent
public class Track
extends java.lang.Object
implements SpaceComponent

A track is a component of a one dimensional space model. It can either be aligned vertically, horizontally or circular.

Since:
March 4th, 2010
